info.name: uBlocko n uMatrix for All to Darkness StylesHeets
info.description:
It's the perfect dark theme for uBlocko and uMatrix on firefox. Darkness for all of them, If you liked uBO and uM, maybe... you will love it.

SCREENSHOTS
/*
uBlock Origin;
uMatrix;
uBO settings;
uM settings;
uM logger;
uBO and uM Popup Panel;
*/

P.S I haven't added the part codes to logger, perhaps uBO or uM would load delay because it. If you don't install uMatrix, you can delete lines (247-451; 551-576) with text editor.
info.additionalInfo:
04/09/2017
fixed saving rules button of background for uBO logger.

01/09/2017
update to v1.2, removed background color for uBO popup panel, support uBO v1.13.8 or LEGACY version, but it's not working on hybrid or webext.

21/06/2017
fixed bugs, update to 1.1, for uBlock v1.12.4+, uMatrix v1.0.0+.

10/06/2017
version: 1.0.1, updated list color for uMatrix, fixed uMatrix poweroff, top buttons.

04/06/2017
version: 1.0

04/06/2017
Fixed for all. Updated version to 1.0, darkness for all on uBlock Orgin and uMatrix. And re-upload screens to Userstyles.

03/06/2017
Fixed bugs.

02/06/2017
The codes had been added for settings page. fixed popup panel and logger.

01/06/2017
Fixed poweroff button, added losting code for logger.

31/05/2017
Dark for popup panel, only.
